resources.string: A Java User Group (JUG) is a group of people who share a common interest in Java technology and meet on a regular basis to share technical ideas and information.

Google Developer Group (GDG) Riga is a place to discuss, learn, and share passion for technology. We focus on developer culture and rich technical content, with the ultimate goal to grow and expand interest in IT within Riga and beyond. All our events are free to attend for everyone and hosted by true technology advocates.

Latvian Oracle User Group (LVOUG) is an independent organization that brings together Oracle users, professionals and other interested people in Latvia. Its purpose is to promote the knowledge and experience among the group members. Inform about the Oracle product enhancements and upgrades as well as provide feedback to Oracle.\nAnyone can become a member of the group.

Every attendee from the conference is invited to join afterparty! Welcome drink and snacks will be provided.
 This is a great time to network so don\’t forget to pick up your badges at Registration so others can clearly identify what your interests are. It's time to party with food, drink, music and fun. The evening will start with a band playing some smooth tunes to get the evening started, followed by STAND UP SHOW residents. You must show your delegate badge to be admitted to the RDD Social, so remember to wear it. It will also make networking much easier. It's going to be a great evening. See you there!
 Address: Mārstaļu iela 16
 Transport: bus will be located next to the Multikino Entrance of the Plaza at 18:45
